mission: Retrieve the Sacred Artifact of Eldoria
description: Journey into the Whispering Caves and defeat the Goblin Chieftain to reclaim the artifact stolen from the village.
Find and collect 10 Moonpetal Herbs from the Moonlit Forest for the Alchemist Lyra.
Defeat 20 Blighted Scarecrows and the Greater Rotling terrorizing the farms west of Oakhaven.
Safely transport the valuable ledger from Silverwood City to the trading post in the Crimson Desert. Beware of bandits!
